DOC.brief_summary: The investigators believe that regulated oxygen-enriched negative Pressure Therapy (RO-NPT) will be beneficial in the reduction or elimination of anaerobic infection in hard-to-heal soft tissue wounds.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Regulated Oxygen-Enriched Negative Pressure Therapy (RO-NPT) On Soft Tissue Wound Repair
DOC.criteria: Patients with hardtoheal wounds Everyone else
